title: OMG
lyrics:
(He can't breathe
He's drowning, oh...
He can't breathe
He can't breathe
Drowning)


OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him

OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him



I let him get a taste now he won't leave (Won't leave)

He said put that in my face like a phone screen (On me)

He was always tryna put me on a pedestal

Man, I didn't even know I was flexible

He treat my body like an edible

Make his head spin around like a merry go



Every time you come over

You always end up under

You could've been a scuba diver

When you're done call your Uber driver

You can't stay no longer

Don't you call this number

They say when it rains it pours but

I bet you never felt this thunder





OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him

OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him



Is that your treat?

That's what he said to me (That's what he said to me)

Can I get a peek at that special recipe? (That special recipe)

What do you drink?

Please tell me what you eat

And I whispered in his ear and said that secret's safe with me



Every time you come over

You always end up under you

Could've been a scuba diver

When you're done call your Uber driver

You can't stay up no longer

Don't you call this number

They say when it rains it pours but

I bet you never felt this thunder



OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him

OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him





The last time you came over, I told you you're my lover

Truth is I'm a liar that was a one-nighter

Yeah that head was fire but your time is up expired

They say when it rains it pours but

I bet you never felt this thunder



OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him

OMG he can't breathe damn he's drowning

In my deep, deep blue sea where they found him



Where they found him

He can't breathe

He can't breathe

He can't breathe

Oh no...
